    library(binancer)
coin_prices <- binance_klines('BTCUSDT', interval = '1d', limit = 45)
str(coin_prices)
#> Classes 'data.table' and 'data.frame':   45 obs. of  12 variables:

    TBA

    library(fxpricer)
library(data.table)
fx <- eurusds(Sys.Date() - 45, Sys.Date())
setkey(balance, date)
setkey(fx, date)
balance <- fx[balance, roll = TRUE]
balance[, btceur := btcusd * eurusd,]
head(balance)
#>          date eurusd  btcusd   btceur
#> 1: 2019-04-06 0.8902 5043.89 4490.071
#> 2: 2019-04-07 0.8902 5170.27 4602.574
#> 3: 2019-04-08 0.8892 5236.90 4656.651
#> 4: 2019-04-09 0.8868 5150.00 4567.020
#> 5: 2019-04-10 0.8866 5308.25 4706.294
#> 6: 2019-04-11 0.8878 5017.37 4454.421

    TBA

    library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data = balance, aes(x = date, y = btceur)) +
  geom_line() +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = eur)
